mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO onbid_history ( item_id, cltr_hstr_no, created_at ) SELECT #{itemId}, oi.cltr_hstr_no, NOW() FROM onbid_item oi WHERE oi.id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT h.cltr_hstr_no AS cltrHstrNo, h.cltr_no AS cltrNo, h.pbct_begn_dtm AS pbctBegnDtm, h.pbct_cls_dtm AS pbctClsDtm, h.open_price AS openPrice, h.cltr_stts_nm AS cltrSttsNm, h.created_at AS createdAt FROM onbid_history h JOIN onbid_item oi ON h.item_id = oi.id WHERE TRIM( REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_REPLACE(oi.ldnm_adrs, '\\[.*?\\]', ''), '\\(.*?\\)', '' ) ) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%') ORDER BY h.created_at DESC
